compliant.section:
V. Other Parties With Your Consent or At Your Direction
We may share Personal Information about you with third parties when you consent to or request such sharing.
compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness of processing based on consent, Conditions for consent

non_compliant.section:
IV. Other Parties in Connection With Corporate Transactions
We may disclose your Personal Information to a third party (or other NUVOTON or NTCJ Affiliate) as part of a reorganisation, merger, transfer, sale, joint venture, assignment or other disposition of all or any portion of Nuvoton Technology Corporation's business, assets or stock, including, without limitation, in connection with any bankruptcy or similar proceeding.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Right to be informed, Controller and processor
non_compliant.amend: The policy should be more specific about what Personal Information will be disclosed and to whom. It should also state that data subjects have the right to object to the processing of their data in these circumstances and how they can exercise this right. Additionally, the specific roles and responsibilities of the controller and processor in this context should be clarified.
